net.trajano.wagon.git

Class GitWagon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.wagon.AbstractWagon
      • org.apache.maven.wagon.StreamWagon
        • net.trajano.wagon.git.internal.AbstractGitWagon
          • net.trajano.wagon.git.GitWagon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.wagon.StreamingWagon, org.apache.maven.wagon.Wagon

    @Component(role=org.apache.maven.wagon.Wagon.class,
           hint="git",
           instantiationStrategy="per-lookup")
public class GitWagon
extends AbstractGitWagon
    Git Wagon. Due to issues with the way maven-site-plugin is improperly sending requests that assume the target repository is a file system, the handling of git URIs fails. This performs an inefficient, but working method of creating a clone per request, but only once per Git repository.

    • Method Detail

      • buildGitUri

        public GitUri buildGitUri(String repositoryUrl)
                   throws org.apache.maven.wagon.ConnectionException,
                          org.apache.maven.wagon.authentication.AuthenticationException
        Constructs the object from a URI string that contains "git:" schema. Builds the wagon specific Git URI based on the repository URL. This is made public rather than protected to allow testing of the method.
        Specified by:
        buildGitUri in class AbstractGitWagon
        Parameters:
        repositoryUrl - repository URL
        Returns:
        Git URI
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.wagon.ConnectionException - problem when connecting
        org.apache.maven.wagon.authentication.AuthenticationException - problem with authentication
